achievements.title: Connect
achievements.description: Join our discord and connect with like minded tech enthusiasts and build better connections.

achievements.title: Ask Out
achievements.description: Get your doubts resolved within the community with others and help solve each others doubts as well.

achievements.title: Mentorship
achievements.description: Learn from the experts from our events such as workshops, conferences and much more.

achievements.title: Opportunities
achievements.description: Learn about various upcoming opportunities in tech through the community and be a part of major events.

achievements.title: Resources
achievements.description: Get access to various free resources through our videos, Newsletter and other sources that you can use to upskill yourself.

achievements.title: Support
achievements.description: Get free hosting and other support for your community projects that you can showcase with anyone.
